## Entity() function

Entity装饰器，装饰实体(表)，装饰类

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function Entity(tblName: string, schema?: string): (target: any) => void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tblName | string | 表名 |
|  schema | string | _(Optional)_ 数据库名 |
